mapper.select:
/* 총괄단 집계 */ WITH TB_PD AS ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , T2.PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , TB_CST AS ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.REQD_DT , T1.CAN_DT , T1.CPS_DT , T1.MSH_WDWAL_DT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 WHERE T1.MNGT_YM = #{metgStartDt} ) , TB_PRTNR AS ( SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO , T2.OG_ID , T2.OG_CD , T3.OG_NM , CASE WHEN T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(DECODE(SUBSTR(LPAD(TRIM(SUBSTR(T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL, 1, 6)), 6, '0'), 1, 1), '0', '20', '19')||SUBSTR(LPAD(TRIM(SUBSTR(T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL, 1, 6)), 6, '0'), 1, 2)) + 1) ELSE '' END PRTNR_AGE , CASE WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '15' THEN 'M' WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' THEN 'J' WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '2' THEN 'C' ELSE '' END PSTN_DV , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM , T3.DGR1_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM , T3.DGR2_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T2 ON T2.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.CLTN_DT IS NULL AND T2.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T2.QLF_DV_CD = '3' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T2.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02')
AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , CASE WHEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN DGR2_LEVL_CNT ELSE '총 계' END DGR2_LEVL_CNT , HOO_PRTNR_NM , MNG_CNT , REAL_ACT_MNG_CNT , REAL_ACT_JIJUM_CNT , ACT_MNG_CNT , NO_ACT_MNG_CNT , CNT_AVERAGE , RECRUIT_CNT , ALL_VISIT_CNT , VISIT_COMPLETE_CNT , AVG_AGE FROM ( SELECT V2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , (SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)) FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T1.OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '2' AND T1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD = V2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD) DGR2_LEVL_CNT , (SELECT HOO_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T1.OG_LEVL_DV_CD = '1' AND T1.OG_CD = V2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD) HOO_PRTNR_NM , COUNT(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) MNG_CNT
, SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) REAL_ACT_MNG_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'J' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) REAL_ACT_JIJUM_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE != 0 AND V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE < CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ACT_MNG_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE = 0 OR VISIT_COMPLETE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NO_ACT_MNG_CNT , CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN VISIT_CSTM ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) END CNT_AVERAGE , CEIL(SUM(VISIT_CSTM)/150 - SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) RECRUIT_CNT
, SUM(VISIT_CSTM) ALL_VISIT_CNT , SUM(VISIT_COMPLETE) VISIT_COMPLETE_CNT , TRUNC(AVG(V2.PRTNR_AGE)) AVG_AGE FROM ( SELECT V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO PRTNR_NO , PRT1.OG_ID , PRT1.PRTNR_AGE , V1.VISIT_CSTM , V1.VISIT_COMPLETE , PRT1.PSTN_DV , PRT1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , PRT1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID FROM ( SELECT SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , COUNT(1) VISIT_CSTM , SUM(CASE WHEN SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) VISIT_COMPLETE FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SV1 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ SV2 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PD1 , TB_CST CST1 WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.ASN_OJ_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO IS NOT NULL AND SV1.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD = '1'
AND SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV2.PDCT_PD_CD = PD1.PD_CD AND PD1.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '11' AND PD1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND SV1.CNTR_NO = CST1.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = CST1.CNTR_SN AND (SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2110','2140','2164') OR (CASE WHEN SV2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM05106251', 'WM05106364', 'WM05106365', 'WM05106366', 'WM05106367', 'WM05106368', 'WM05106369', 'WM05106370', 'WM05106371') THEN '2110' ELSE SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD END) = '2110') AND CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND CST1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL AND (CST1.MSH_WDWAL_DT IS NULL OR CST1.MSH_WDWAL_DT NOT LIKE #{metgStartDt}||'%')
GROUP BY SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ) V1 , TB_PRTNR PRT1 WHERE 1=1 AND PRT1.PRTNR_NO = V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO(+) ) V2 GROUP BY ROLLUP(DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD) ORDER BY DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD )

/* 매니저 계정 및 재적 현황 */ WITH TB_PD AS ( SELECT DISTINCT T1.PD_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , T2.PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , TB_CST AS ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.REQD_DT , T1.CAN_DT , T1.CPS_DT , T1.MSH_WDWAL_DT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 WHERE T1.MNGT_YM = #{metgStartDt} ) , TB_PRTNR AS ( SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO , T2.OG_ID , T2.OG_CD , T3.OG_NM , CASE WHEN T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(DECODE(SUBSTR(LPAD(TRIM(SUBSTR(T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL, 1, 6)), 6, '0'), 1, 1), '0', '20', '19')||SUBSTR(LPAD(TRIM(SUBSTR(T1.RRNO_FRPSN_VAL, 1, 6)), 6, '0'), 1, 2)) + 1) ELSE '' END PRTNR_AGE , CASE WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '15' THEN 'M' WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '7' THEN 'J' WHEN T2.PSTN_DV_CD = '2' THEN 'C' ELSE '' END PSTN_DV , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM , T3.DGR1_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , T3.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM , T3.DGR2_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NM , T3.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T2 ON T2.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T2.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T2.QLF_DV_CD = '3' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T3.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T2.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02')
AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT CASE WHEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD IS NOT NULL AND DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD IS NULL THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD||' 계' WHEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD IS NOT NULL AND DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD IS NOT NULL THEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD WHEN DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD IS NULL AND DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD IS NULL THEN '총 계' END DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , HOO_PRTNR_NM , BLD_NM , MNG_CNT , REAL_ACT_MNG_CNT , REAL_ACT_JIJUM_CNT , ACT_MNG_CNT , NO_ACT_MNG_CNT , CNT_AVERAGE , RECRUIT_CNT , ALL_VISIT_CNT , VISIT_COMPLETE_CNT , AVG_AGE FROM (
SELECT V2.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD , V2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , (SELECT T1.HOO_PRTNR_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.OG_CD = V2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD) HOO_PRTNR_NM , (SELECT T1.BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND T1.OG_CD = V2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD) BLD_NM , COUNT(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) MNG_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) REAL_ACT_MNG_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'J' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) REAL_ACT_JIJUM_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE != 0 AND V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE < CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ACT_MNG_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE = 0 OR VISIT_COMPLETE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NO_ACT_MNG_CNT , CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TRUNC(SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN VISIT_CSTM ELSE 0 END) / SUM(CASE WHEN VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) END CNT_AVERAGE , CEIL(SUM(VISIT_CSTM)/150 - SUM(CASE WHEN V2.PSTN_DV = 'M' AND VISIT_COMPLETE >= CASE WHEN #{metgStartDt} <= '202206' THEN 20 ELSE 50 END THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) RECRUIT_CNT , SUM(VISIT_CSTM) ALL_VISIT_CNT , SUM(VISIT_COMPLETE) VISIT_COMPLETE_CNT , TRUNC(AVG(V2.PRTNR_AGE)) AVG_AGE
FROM ( SELECT V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO PRTNR_NO , PRT1.OG_ID , PRT1.PRTNR_AGE , V1.VISIT_CSTM , V1.VISIT_COMPLETE , PRT1.PSTN_DV , PRT1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD , PRT1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID , PRT1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD FROM ( SELECT SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO , COUNT(1) VISIT_CSTM , SUM(CASE WHEN SV1.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) VISIT_COMPLETE FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ SV1 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ SV2 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL PD1 , TB_CST CST1 WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.ASN_OJ_YM = #{metgStartDt} AND SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO IS NOT NULL AND SV1.CNFM_PSIC_DV_CD = '1'
AND SV1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = SV2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND SV2.PDCT_PD_CD = PD1.PD_CD AND PD1.PD_PRP_VAL20 != '11' AND PD1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND SV1.CNTR_NO = CST1.CNTR_NO AND SV1.CNTR_SN = CST1.CNTR_SN AND (SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD NOT IN ('2110','2140','2164') OR (CASE WHEN SV2.PDCT_PD_CD IN ('WM05106251', 'WM05106364', 'WM05106365', 'WM05106366', 'WM05106367', 'WM05106368', 'WM05106369', 'WM05106370', 'WM05106371') THEN '2110' ELSE SV1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD END) = '2110') AND CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND CST1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL AND (CST1.MSH_WDWAL_DT IS NULL OR CST1.MSH_WDWAL_DT NOT LIKE #{metgStartDt}||'%') GROUP BY SV1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO ) V1 , TB_PRTNR PRT1 WHERE 1=1 AND PRT1.PRTNR_NO = V1.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO(+) ) V2 GROUP BY ROLLUP(DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD, DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD) ORDER BY DGR1_LEVL_OG_CD, DGR2_LEVL_OG_CD )
